svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-05-19T07:17:18.082Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/113.0" etag="L2x7WslvpyiL8KNZqAoc" version="21.3.2" type="google"><diagram name="Page-1" id="7EX4vYBWkbbm2heb8Gkh"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 333px; height: 1px; padding-top: 110px; margin-left: 267px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: JetBrains Mono; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.font: partition::*_request

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 31px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: JetBrains Mono; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 448px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: JetBrains Mono; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 10px;
div.font: partition request handler (request serving loop async task)

div.style: font-size: 10px;
font-size: 10px;
div.font: - Idempotent partition::*_request: performs the necessary

div.style: font-size: 10px;
div.font: idempotent operation on the underlying segmented log and

div.style: font-size: 10px;
div.font: responds with the result on the response channel.

div.style: font-size: 10px;
font-size: 10px;
div.font: - Non-idempotent partition::*_request: Replicates

div.style: font-size: 10px;
div.font: non-idempotent operations on all follower partitions in the Raft group if this partition is a leader, and applies the operation locally. If this partition is a follower, it simply operates locally as required. A leader partition replica can serve such requests only from client peers. A follower partition replica can serve such requests only from leader partition replicas. For client requests, we redirect to leader replica.

div.style: font-size: 10px;
font-size: 10px;
div.font: - membership::join(i): add {node #i} to local priority queue. If the required number of replicas is more than the current number, pop() one member from the priority queue and add it to the Raft group (making it an eligible candidate in the Raft leader election process). If the current replica is a leader, we send a partition::create(...) request.

div.style: font-size: 10px;
font-size: 10px;
div.font: - membership::leave(j): remove {node #j} from priority queue and Raft group if present. If {node #j} was not present in the Raft group no further action is necessary. If it was present in the Raft group, pop() another member from the priority queue, add it to the Raft group and proceed similarly as in the case of membership::join(j)

div.div: - membership::update_weight(k): updates priority for {node #k} by recomputing rendezvous_hash for {node #k} with this partition replicas partition_id. Next, if any node in the priority queue has a higher priority than any of the nodes in the Raft group, the node with the least priority is replaced by the highest priority element from the queue. We send a partition::remove(partition_id, ...) request to {node #k}. Afterwards we proceed similarly to membership::{leave, join} requests.

switch.text: partition request handler (request serving loop async task)...
